details.description: You need a strategic export licence to export controlled goods out of the UK
details.will_continue_on: the Export Control Organisation's export licensing database SPIRE
details.licence_short_description: You need a strategic export control licence to export goods on the Strategic Export Control List.
details.licence_overview:
Check if you need a [strategic export licence](/do-your-goods-need-an-export-licence "Strategic exports: when to request an export licence") for some controlled goods, eg military, defence or security related goods. This also covers [Dual Use goods](/controls-on-dual-use-goods "Controls on Dual-Use goods") that can be used for both civil and military purposes, eg some software. 

This means items that are one of the following:

- listed on the [UK Strategic Export Control Lists](/uk-strategic-export-control-lists-the-consolidated-list-of-strategic-military-and-dual-use-items "UK Strategic Export Control Lists") 
- on [Sanctions Lists](/sanctions-embargoes-and-restrictions "Sanctions, embargoes and restrictions") 
- fall under [end-use controls](/weapons-of-mass-destruction-wmd-end-use-control "Weapons of Mass Destruction: End-Use Control")

^[Find out if you need a strategic export control licence.](/do-your-goods-need-an-export-licence "Strategic exports: when to request an export licence")^

##How to apply

All applications should be made via the ECO's [SPIRE export licensing system.](https://www.spire.bis.gov.uk/eng/fox/espire/LOGIN/login "SPIRE export licensing system"){:rel="external"}

##Fines and penalties

[Breaching export controls](http://www.bis.gov.uk/policies/export-control-organisation/eco-press-prosecutions "Export Control Prosecutions Notices"){:rel="external"} is a criminal offence. Penalties can vary depending on the nature of the offence. They range from:

* revocation of a licence 
* seizure of goods 
* issuing of compound penalty fine 
* imprisonment for up to 10 years

%Check if there are [embargoes or sanctions](/sanctions-embargoes-and-restrictions "Sanctions, embargoes and restrictions") against exporting certain goods (eg military, defence or security related goods) to individual countries.%
